name: The Castle Break Incident
description:
Ahoy! I see we have another adventurer eager to enter the Castle of Trollge.
Well, if it's so, let's go! Just watch out. There's old decor everywhere, doors, and the exit is hard to find. Something i wouldn't like to tell you is that the entire time you're there, a very disturbing lanky trollface will be hunting you. Find the notes, get out, don't get killed by Trollge. Simple, right?

Credits:
WizardDev - Art and some sfx
WackyIdeas - Coding
Lina - Playtesting
